wynnlib.ui.check_box.right_click: Right-Click to deselect all other options
wynnlib.setting_option.desc.durability: Rendering durability bar on crafted items.
wynnlib.setting_option.desc.consumable_c: Rendering remaining charges of consumable on item.
wynnlib.setting_option.desc.skill_point_: Rendering skill points on the skill point icons, which allow it to display more than 64 points.
wynnlib.setting_option.desc.item_color: Rendering item background color in inventory & hotbar according to its rarity.
wynnlib.unidentified_box.name: Unidentified %s
wynnlib.unidentified_box.desc: This item's powers have//been sealed. Take it to//an identifier to//unlock its potential.
wynnlib.tooltip.tome.effect: Add f{%s}//to your character when used.
wynnlib.tooltip.position_modifier.left: (To ingredients to the left of this one)
wynnlib.tooltip.position_modifier.right: (To ingredients to the right of this one)
wynnlib.tooltip.archetype.title: Архетип %s
wynnlib.tooltip.shift_for_upgrade_descri: Hold shift to see upgrade descriptions
wynnlib.major_id.desc.magnet: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you
wynnlib.major_id.desc.plague: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs
wynnlib.major_id.desc.hawkeye: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal 6{✣} 10%, e{✦} 1%, and f{❋} 1%
wynnlib.major_id.desc.greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health
wynnlib.major_id.desc.cavalryman: You may cast spells and attack with a -70% damage penalty while on a horse
wynnlib.major_id.desc.guardian: 20% of damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you
wynnlib.major_id.desc.hero: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 30% bonus damage and defence
wynnlib.major_id.desc.altruism: Nearby players gain 35% of the health you naturally regenerate
wynnlib.major_id.desc.arcanes: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted
wynnlib.major_id.desc.rovingassassin: Vanish will no longer block mana and health regeneration
wynnlib.major_id.desc.madness: Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds
wynnlib.major_id.desc.lightweight: You no longer take fall damage
wynnlib.major_id.desc.sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost
wynnlib.major_id.desc.taunt: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream
wynnlib.major_id.desc.rally: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless
wynnlib.major_id.desc.cherry_bombs: Your Smoke Bombs explodes instantly, and increase their Neutral Damage by +90%
wynnlib.major_id.desc.freerunner: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%
wynnlib.major_id.desc.peaceful_effigy: Your Totem will last twice as long
wynnlib.major_id.desc.furious_effigy: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved
wynnlib.major_id.desc.flashfreeze: Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s
wynnlib.major_id.desc.fission: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong
wynnlib.major_id.desc.explosive_impact: Your Exploding ID can trigger when hitting mobs with your Main Attack
wynnlib.major_id.desc.geocentrism: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time
wynnlib.archetype.desc.fallen: Павшие могут наносить огромный урон и становиться сильнее при атаке.//8{(Урон, Высокие Риски)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.battle_monk: Боевые монахи - быстрые святые воины, которые преуспевают в ближнем бою.//8{(Комбо, Отдача)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.paladin: Паладины могут выдерживать огромные удары и суппортить союзников.//8{(Сопротивление, Баффы)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.boltslinger: Пулемётчики наносят огромное количество ударов и превосходны на близком расстоянии. //8{(Скорость, Взрывной Урон)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.sharpshooter: Снайперы превосходно прицеливаются и могут наносить жестокие удары.//8{(Дальность, Мощные Выстрелы)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trapper: Охотники могут заманивать врагов в ловушку и использовать зверей.//8{(Отложенный Урон, Контроль Толпы)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.riftwalker: Мироходцы искривляют время и становятся сильнее по мере того, как бои затягиваются.//8{(Мобильность, Стакающийся Урон)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.light_bender: Владыки Света поддерживают союзников и становятся сильнее по мере их исцеления.//8{(Суппорт, Баффы)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.arcanist: Арканисты наносят разрушительный урон и вносят хаос.//8{(Взрывной Урон, Мана)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.shadestepper: Тенеходцы скрывают себя и наносят сокрушительный урон в нужное время.//8{(Максимум урона, Минимум защиты, Взрывной Урон)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trickster: Обманщики призывают клонов и сбивают врагов с толку различными.//8{(Контроль Толпы, Уловки)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acrobat: Акробаты - ловкие и ударные комбо бойцы.//8{(Комбо, Скорость)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.summoner: Призыватели используют тотемы и миньонов, чтобы сокрушать врагов.//8{(Миньоны, Урон)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.ritualist: Ритуалисты творят чудеса с помощью гимнов и танцев, и могут менять состояние на лету с помощью масок.//8{(Баффы, Многосторонность)}
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acolyte: Послушники используют свое собственное здоровье, чтобы поддерживать союзников и наносить урон.//8{(Суппорт, Урон)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_main_attack: Deal damage in a small area forward.
wynnlib.ability.desc.bash: Violently bash the ground, dealing high damage in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_1: Improve your n{@{.warrior_main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a spear.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_bash_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.bash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_bash: n{@{.bash}} will hit a second time at a farther range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.charge: Charge forward at high speed.//8{(Hold shift while charging to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tougher_skin: Harden your skin and gain f{+${resistant_bonus}%} Base Defence. ////For every f{${id_convertor.source.HEALTHREGEN}%} or f{${id_convertor.source.HEALTHREGENRAW} Raw} Health Regen you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}} Health. (Max ${id_convertor.max})
wynnlib.ability.desc.vehement: For every f{${id_convertor.source.DAMAGEBONUS}%} or f{${id_convertor.source.DAMAGEBONUSRAW} Raw Main} Attack Damage you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}%} Walk Speed. (Max ${id_convertor.max}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.uppercut: Rocket enemies in the air and deal massive damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_charge_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.charge}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.war_scream: Emit a terrorizing roar that deals damage, pull nearby enemies, and add damage resistance to yourself and allies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.heavy_impact: After using n{@{.charge}}, violently crash down unto the ground and deal damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_earth_maste: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_thunder_mas: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_fire_master: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_water_maste: Increase your damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.quadruple_bash: n{@{.bash}} will cast f{4} times consecutively at double the speed.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fireworks: Mobs hit by n{@{.uppercut}} will explode mid-air and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flyby_jab: Damage enemies in your way when using n{@{.charge}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flaming_uppercut: n{@{.uppercut}} will light mobs on fire, dealing damage every f{${damage_interval}} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.half_moon_swipe: n{@{.uppercut}} will deal a footsweep attack at a longer and wider angle.
wynnlib.ability.desc.generalist: After casting f{${values.1}} different spells in a row, your next spell will cost f{${values.2}} Mana.
wynnlib.ability.desc.counter: When dodging a nearby enemy attack, get f{${chance}%} chance to instantly attack back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mantle_of_the_bovem: When casting n{@{.war_scream}}, create a holy shield around you that reduces all incoming damage by f{${mantle_resistance}%} for f{${charges}} hits. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.bakals_grasp: After casting n{@{.war_scream}}, become b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)//8{(Shift + War Scream to cancel)}////While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, you lose the ability to f{heal}, and every f{${corrupted.rate}%} health you lose will grant you f{+${corrupted.damage_boost}} Raw Damage. (Max ${corrupted.max_boost})
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_2: Improve your n{@{.warrior_main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a spear.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.uppercut}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.aerodynamics: During n{@{.charge}}, you can steer and change direction.
wynnlib.ability.desc.provoke: Mobs damaged by n{@{.war_scream}} will target only you for at least f{${values.1}s}.////Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.war_scream}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.air_shout: n{@{.war_scream}} will fire a projectile that can go through walls and deal damage multiple times.
wynnlib.ability.desc.enraged_blow: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, every f{${enraged_blow.rate}%} of Health you lose will increase your damage by f{+${enraged_blow.damage_boost}%}. (Max ${enraged_blow.max_boost}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.flying_kick: Hitting mobs with n{@{.charge}} will halt your momentum and knock them away.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_mantle: Add f{+${charges_modifier}} additional charges to n{@{.mantle_of_the_bovemists}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.manachism: If you receive a hit that's less than f{${values.1}%} of your max HP, gain f{${values.2}} Mana. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.boiling_blood: n{@{.bash}} will leave a puddle of boiling blood after its first explosion, slowing down and damaging enemies on it every f{${damage_interval}} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ragnarokkr: n{@{.war_scream}} become deafening, increasing its range and giving damage bonus to players.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ambidextrous: Increase your chance to attack with n{@{.counter}} by f{+${chance_modifier}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.burning_heart: For every f{${id_convertor.source.HEALTHBONUS}} Health Bonus you have from item IDs, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}%} Fire Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.intoxicating_blood: After leaving b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, gain f{${values.1}%} of the health lost back for each enemy killed while b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.collide: Enemies thrown into walls from n{@{.flying_kick}} will explode and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rejuvenating_skin: Regain back f{${values.1}%} of the damage you take as healing over f{${values.2}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.comet: After being hit by n{@{.fireworks}}, enemies will crash unto the ground and receive more damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.uncontainable_corru: Reduce the cooldown of n{@{.bakals_grasp}} by f{${-cooldown_modifier}s}, and increase the raw damage gained for every f{${values.1}%} of health lost by f{+${corrupted_modifier.damage_boost}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiant_devotee: For every f{${id_convertor.source.REFLECTION}%} Reflection you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}/5s} Mana Regen. (Max ${id_convertor.max}/5s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.whirlwind_strike: n{@{.uppercut}} will create a strong gust of air, launching you upward with enemies.//8{(Hold shift to stay grounded)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.mythril_skin: Gain f{+${resistant_bonus}%} Base Resistance and become immune to knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.armour_breaker: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, losing f{${values.1}%} Health will make your next n{@{.uppercut}} destroy enemies' defense stats.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shield_strike: Deal damage around you for each mantle lost when n{@{.mantle_of_the_bovemists}} loses all charges.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sparkling_hope: Deal damage to all nearby enemies every time you heal f{${values.1}%} of your max health.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massive_bash: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, every f{${massive_bash.rate}%} Health you lose will increase n{@{.bash}}'s area of effect radius by f{+${massive_bash.range_boost}}. (Max ${massive_bash.max_boost})
wynnlib.ability.desc.tempest: n{@{.war_scream}} will ripple the ground and deal damage f{${hits}} times over a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spirit_of_the_rabbi: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.charge}} and increase your Walk Speed by f{+${id_modifier.SPEED}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massacre: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, if your attack speed (affected by IDs) is f{${massacre.attack_speed}} or lower, hitting an enemy with your n{@{.warrior_main_attack}} will add f{+${massacre.rate}%} b{Corruption} to your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}} bar.
wynnlib.ability.desc.axe_kick: Increase the damage and mana cost of n{@{.uppercut}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiance: n{@{.bash}} will buff positive IDs of yourself and allies. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_bash_2: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.bash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_war_scream: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.war_scream}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.discombobulate: Hitting an enemy will increase the elemental damage you deal to them by f{+${discombobulate.rate}}. (Max +${discombobulate.max})//This bonus decays f{${discombobulate.decay}} every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cyclone: After casting n{@{.war_scream}}, envelop yourself with a vortex that damages nearby enemies every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.thunderclap: n{@{.bash}} will cast at the player's position at double the speed and with an increased area of effect. All elemental conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.second_chance: Keeps you alive with f{${values.1}%} of your health remaining after receiving a fatal blow. (${values.2}m Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_pact: If you do not have enough mana to cast a spell, spend health instead. (f{${values.1}%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.haemorrhage: Reduce n{@{.blood_pact}}'s health cost. (f{${values.1}%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.brink_of_madness: You gain a f{+${brink_madness.resistance}%} Resistance buff if your health is at f{${brink_madness.health}%} or less.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_2: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.uppercut}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.martyr: When you receive a fatal blow, all nearby allies become invincible.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_main_attack: Fire an arrow with high velocity and range, deal damage to enemies and other targets in a very small area around where the arrow hits.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_bomb: Throw a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deal high damage over a large area.//8{(Self-damage for ${self_damage}% of your DPS)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bow_proficiency_1: Improve your n{@{.archer_main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a bow.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.heart_shatter: Hitting a mob directly with n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will shatter its heart and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape: Throw yourself backward to avoid danger.//8{(Hold shift while escaping to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_shots: Double n{@{.archer_main_attack}} arrows and reduces their damage by f{${main_attack_modifier.damage}%}.//8{(Harder to hit distant enemies)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.power_shots: Your n{@{.archer_main_attack}} arrows have increased speed and knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_storm: Shoot f{${archer_stream}} stream of f{${hits}} arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.escape}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_shield: Forms a shield around you that deals damage and knocks mobs away when they touch it. (${charges} charges)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windy_feet: Casting n{@{.escape}} grants a speed buff to you and nearby players.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_thunder_mast: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_fire_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_earth_master: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_water_master: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_rain: When n{@{.arrow_shield}} loses its last charge, spew f{${hits}} arrows around you to rain down on enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.nimble_string: Doubles the speed of n{@{.arrow_storm}} and shoots f{+${hits}} arrows per stream.
wynnlib.ability.desc.phantom_ray: Condense n{@{.arrow_storm}} into a single ray that damages enemies f{${hits}} times per second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fire_creep: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will leave a trail of fire for f{${duration}s}, enemies that walk into it take damage every f{${damage_interval}s}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bryophyte_roots: Hitting an enemy with n{@{.arrow_storm}} will create an area of effect that slows them down and deals damage every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.triple_shots: Triples n{@{.archer_main_attack}} arrows but they deal f{${main_attack_modifier.damage}%} of normal n{@{.archer_main_attack}} arrow damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.frenzy: Hitting an enemy will give you a brief buff of f{+${values.1}%} Walk Speed. (Max ${values.2}%)//Decay f{${values.3}%} of the bonus every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.guardian_angels: Your n{@{.arrow_shield}} arrows turn into sentient bows that attack nearby enemies up to f{${hits}} times each.//8{(@{.arrow_shield} will no longer knock mobs away)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.focus: When hitting an aggressive enemy f{${values.1}+} blocks away, gain b{+1 @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}. (Max ${max_focus})//Resets if you miss once.
wynnlib.ability.desc.basaltic_trap: When you hit the ground with n{@{.arrow_bomb}}, leave a b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_trap}} that damages enemies. (Max ${max_trap} Traps)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windstorm: n{@{.arrow_storm}} will shoot f{+${archer_stream_modifier}} stream of arrows and f{+${hits}} extra arrows per stream.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_storm}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grappling_hook: When casting n{@{.escape}}, throw a hook that pulls you when hitting a block. If you hit an enemy, pull them towards you instead.//8{(@{.escape} will not throw you backward anymore)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.implosion: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} pull enemies towards you. If a b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_trap}} is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead.//Increase n{@{.heart_shatter}}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.patient_hunter: Your b{Traps} will deal f{+${patient_hunter.sec_boost}%} more damage for every second it's active. (Max +${patient_hunter.max_boost}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.stormy_feet: n{@{.windy_feet}} will last longer and grant a stronger speed buff.
wynnlib.ability.desc.traveler: For every f{${id_convertor.source.SPEED}%} Walk Speed you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate} Raw} Spell Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max})
wynnlib.ability.desc.twains_arc: If you have b{${values.1}+ @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}, holding shift will summon the Twain's Arc. Charge it up to shoot a destructive long-range beam.//8{(Damage is dealt as n{@{.archer_main_attack}} Damage)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bouncing_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will bounce once when hitting a block or enemy.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fierce_stomp: When using n{@{.escape}}, hold shift to quickly drop down and deal damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_traps: Increase the maximum amount of active b{Traps} you can have by f{+${max_trap_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.leap: Leap forward when you double jump. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.homing_shots: Your n{@{.archer_main_attack}} arrows will follow nearby enemies and will be unaffected by gravity.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shocking_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will be unaffected by gravity and all damage conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_arrow_shield: n{@{.arrow_shield}}'s radius, knockback, and damage is increased.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mana_trap: Your b{Traps} will give you f{${values.1}} Mana per second when you stick close to them.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape_artist: When casting n{@{.escape}}, release f{${hits}} arrows towards the ground.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_guardian_ang: Your n{@{.guardian_angels}} can shoot f{+${hits}} extra arrows before disappearing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.initiator: If you do not damage an enemy for f{${values.1}s} or more, your next successful hit will deal f{+${ability_damage_bonus}%} damage and add b{+${values.2} @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_storm}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.call_of_the_hound: n{@{.arrow_shield}} summon a b{Hound} that will attack and drag aggressive enemies towards your traps.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_hurricane: n{@{.arrow_storm}} will shoot f{+${archer_stream_modifier}} extra stream of arrows.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_shiel: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_shield}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rocket_jump: n{@{.arrow_bomb}}'s self-damage will knock you further away.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shrapnel_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}}'s explosion will fling f{${hits}} shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.decimator: n{@{.phantom_ray}} will increase its damage by f{${decimator.damage_boost}%} everytime you do not miss with it. (Max ${decimator.max_boost}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_2: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.escape}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_hook: Increases your n{@{.grappling_hook}}'s range, speed and strength.
wynnlib.ability.desc.geyser_stomp: n{@{.fierce_stomp}} will create geysers, dealing more damage and pushing enemies away vertically.
wynnlib.ability.desc.crepuscular_ray: If you have b{${values.1} @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}, casting n{@{.arrow_storm}} will make you levitate and shoot f{${values.2}} homing arrows per second until you run out of b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}.////While in this state, you will lose b{${values.3} @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}} per second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grape_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will throw f{${hits}} additional smaller bombs when exploding.
wynnlib.ability.desc.elusive: If you do not get hit for f{${values.1}+} seconds, become immune to self-damage and n{@{.arrow_storm}} loses its recoil.//8{(Agility dodging counts as not getting hit)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tangled_traps: Your b{Traps} will be connected by a rope that deals damage to enemies every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_patient_hu: Add f{+${patient_hunter_modifier.max_boost}%} Max Damage to n{@{.patient_hunter}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.snow_storm: Enemies near you will be slowed down.
wynnlib.ability.desc.all_seeing_panoptes: Your bows from n{@{.guardian_angels}} become all-seeing, increasing their range, damage and letting them shoot up to f{+${hits}} times each.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.minefield: Allow you to place b{+${max_trap_modifier} Traps}, but with reduced range and damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_main_attack: Damage all targets in a straight line immediately, able to pierce through blocks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.meteor: Summon a slow but powerful meteor from the sky, dealing massive damage over a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.wand_proficiency_1: Improve your n{@{.mage_main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a wand.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_meteor_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.meteor}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shooting_star: Drastically increase the speed of your n{@{.meteor}} ability.
wynnlib.ability.desc.wand_proficiency_2: Improve your n{@{.mage_main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a wand.
wynnlib.ability.desc.teleport: Instantly teleport in the direction you're facing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.wisdom: For every f{${id_convertor.source.SPELLDAMAGE}%} or f{${id_convertor.source.SPELLDAMAGERAW} Raw} Spell Damage you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}/5s} Mana Regen. (Max ${id_convertor.max}/5s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.heal: Heals you and nearby allies in a large area around you.//8{(When healing others, you can't heal more than ${values.1}% of n{their} max health)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_teleport_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.teleport}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ice_snake: Summon a fast-moving ice snake that damages and slows enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_thunder_master: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_fire_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_earth_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_water_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.wind_slash: When using n{@{.teleport}}, slash through the air and deal damage to enemies you pierce.
wynnlib.ability.desc.thunderstorm: After casting n{@{.meteor}}, summon f{${hits}} lighting strikes and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.burning_sigil: n{@{.meteor}} will leave a sigil of fire on the ground that damages enemies every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sunshower: n{@{.heal}} emit a strong light, damaging nearby enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.windsweeper: Your n{@{.mage_main_attack}} will add b{+1 Winded} to enemies you hit. (Max ${max_winded}, ${cooldown}s Cooldown)////n{@{.ice_snake}} will deal additional damage to enemies for every b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} they have.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ophanim: When casting n{@{.meteor}}, instead summon f{${ophanim.count}} orbs of light with f{${ophanim.health}} Health that will attack when you use your n{@{.mage_main_attack}}.////When they damage an enemy, they lose f{${ophanim.loss}%} of their Health. They can be healed back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arcane_transfer: n{@{.meteor}} and n{@{.ice_snake}} will add f{+${mana_storing}} Mana to a b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} for every aggressive enemy you hit.////n{@{.heal}} will now transfer the content of your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} into usable Mana instead of healing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_heal_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.heal}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.purification: n{@{.heal}} and n{@{.arcane_transfer}} will purify you of all negative effects and fire. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.sentient_snake: n{@{.ice_snake}} will follow the direction you're facing, allowing you to control it.
wynnlib.ability.desc.eye_piercer: n{@{.teleport}} will blind enemies, confusing them for a brief period of time.
wynnlib.ability.desc.breathless: n{@{.meteor}} will deal additional damage to enemies for every b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} they have.
wynnlib.ability.desc.larger_mana_bank_1: Increase your maximum b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} by f{+${mana_bank_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_ice_snake_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.ice_snake}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fortitude: Healing f{${values.1}%} of your max health within f{${values.2}s} will apply a damage bonus to every player you've healed. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_teleport_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.teleport}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.pyrokinesis: When your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} reaches f{${values.1}}, your n{@{.mage_main_attack}} explodes upon impact with enemies.//8{(Damage is dealt as n{@{.mage_main_attack}} Damage)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.blink: n{@{.teleport}} will trigger f{${tp_successions}} times in quick successions.
wynnlib.ability.desc.healthier_ophanim_1: Increase the health of @{.ophanim}'s orbs by f{+${ophanim_modifier.health}} and reduce the damage they take when hitting an enemy by f{${-ophanim_modifier.loss}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.seance: For every f{${id_convertor.source.LIFESTEAL}/3s} Lifesteal you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}%} Spell Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.transonic_warp: n{@{.teleport}} will deal additional damage to enemies for every b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} they have.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mage_fluid_healing: For every f{1%} b{❉} Water Damage Bonus you have from items, buff n{@{.heal}}'s healing power by f{+${fluid_heal}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.orphions_pulse: n{@{.heal}} will trigger f{${pulse_heal.trigger}} more times, increasing your overall healing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arcane_restoration: n{@{.pyrokinesis}} will add f{+${values.1}} Mana every f{${values.2}s} to your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} when hitting an aggressive enemy.
wynnlib.ability.desc.diffusion: If you kill an enemy with b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} on them, the leftover b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} will spread to other nearby foes.
wynnlib.ability.desc.lightweaver: Healing f{${lightweaver.heal}%} of your max health within f{${lightweaver.time_limit}s} will summon a rotating orb for f{${duration}s} that damages enemies upon contact. (Max ${lightweaver.max} Orbs)
wynnlib.ability.desc.arcane_speed: You gain a f{+${values.1}%} speed buff for f{${duration}s} after casting n{@{.heal}} or n{@{.arcane_transfer}}. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.larger_mana_bank_2: Increase your maximum b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} by f{+${mana_bank_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_winded_1: Increase your maximum b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} by f{+${max_winded_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.psychokinesis: Shoot n{@{.meteor}} from you as a slow projectile.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_ice_snake_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.ice_snake}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.explosive_entrance: Deal damage in an area on the location you n{@{.teleport}} to.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_meteor_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.meteor}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.chaos_explosion: When your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} reaches f{${values.1}}, casting n{@{.arcane_transfer}} will rapidly unleash the last f{${values.2}} spells you've cast in order.
wynnlib.ability.desc.time_dilation: Create an area of effect when sprinting that increases the speed of all allies the longer they run in it.//8{(Step out or stop running to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.gust: n{@{.ice_snake}} will add b{+${values.1} Winded} to enemies and deal more damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_ophanim: Increase your maximum orbs from n{@{.ophanim}} by f{+${ophanim_modifier.count}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arctic_snake: n{@{.ice_snake}} will freeze enemies for f{${duration}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arcane_power: n{@{.meteor}} and n{@{.ice_snake}} will add f{+${mana_storing_modifier}} Mana to your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} for each aggressive mob you hit.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_winded_2: Increase your maximum b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} by f{+${max_winded_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.dynamic_faith: For every f{${id_convertor.source.STAMINA}%} Sprint you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}%} Thunder Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.healthier_ophanim_2: Increase the health of your orbs from n{@{.ophanim}} by f{+${ophanim_modifier.health}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.larger_mana_bank_3: Increase your maximum b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_mana_bank}} by f{+${mana_bank_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.devitalize: Enemies will deal f{${values.1}%} damage for every b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} they have.
wynnlib.ability.desc.divination: Increase your maximum orbs from n{@{.ophanim}} by f{+${ophanim_modifier.count}} and reduce their damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sunflare: Healing f{${values.1}%} of your max Health within f{${values.2}s} will make your next n{@{.heal}} give every nearby ally a temporary immunity buff. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.arcane_overflow: n{@{.arcane_transfer}} will allow you to overflow your mana over its maximum limits. (Max ${values.1})
wynnlib.ability.desc.timelock: Holding shift and casting n{@{.heal}} will absorb all b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} on nearby enemies and make you b{Timelocked}.////While b{Timelocked}, your mana will not be depleted and you become immovable from external forces. Enemies will receive b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.mage_winded}} damage for all absorbed stacks. (Max ${values.1})
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_heal_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.heal}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.manastorm: If you have more than f{${values.1}} Mana, casting a spell will give you f{+${values.2}} Mana over f{${duration}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_lightweaver: Increase your Max Orbs by f{+${lightweaver_modifier.max}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_main_attac: Hitting all enemies in a small area forward.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spin_attack: Slash rapidly around you, damaging enemies over a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.dagger_proficiency_: Increase your Walk Speed and n{@{.assassin_main_attack}}'s damage by f{+${id_modifier.SPEED}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_spin_attack: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.spin_attack}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_spin: n{@{.spin_attack}} will activate twice with a larger area of effect.
wynnlib.ability.desc.dash: Dash in the direction you're facing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.poisoned_blade: For every f{${id_convertor.source.DAMAGEBONUS}%} or f{${id_convertor.source.DAMAGEBONUSRAW} Raw} Main Attack Damage you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}/3s} Poison Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max}/3s)////Your n{@{.assassin_main_attack}} gain additional range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_slice: Your n{@{.assassin_main_attack}} will hit twice, but deal f{${main_attack_modifier.damage}%} damage per hit.
wynnlib.ability.desc.smoke_bomb: Throw a bomb that slowly emanates smoke, damaging all enemies in it every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_dash_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.dash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.multihit: Unleashs a rapid flurry of f{${hits}} hits to enemies facing you, dealing heavy damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_earth_mast: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_thunder_ma: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_water_mast: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_air_master: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.assassin_fire_maste: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.backstab: Makes n{@{.multihit}} a single devastating hit. If you strike an enemy from behind, it deals f{double} the damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fatality: n{@{.multihit}} will deal an additional final slash.
wynnlib.ability.desc.vanish: n{@{.dash}} will vanish you into the shadows. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)//You cannot heal or gain mana while in that state.//8{(Attack or get hit to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.sticky_bomb: n{@{.smoke_bomb}} will stick to enemies and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.righting_reflex: When you hold shift while airborne, slowly glide and become immune to fall damage. (Max ${values.1}s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.surprise_strike: Your first hit after casting n{@{.vanish}} will deal f{+${ability_damage_bonus}%} more damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mirror_image: Summon b{${clones} Clones} after reappearing from n{@{.vanish}} that will follow you and protect you. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)////When hit, get a chance to take f{${values.1}%} less damage and lose b{${values.2} Clone}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.lacerate: n{@{.spin_attack}} will lunge you forward, deal f{${hits}} strikes and then lunge you upward.
wynnlib.ability.desc.silent_killer: Reset n{@{.vanish}}'s cooldown after killing an enemy.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shenanigans: For every f{${id_convertor.source.EMERALDSTEALING}%} Stealing you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}/3s} Mana Steal. (Max ${id_convertor.max}/3s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.wall_of_smoke: n{@{.smoke_bomb}} will throw f{+${smoke_bombs_modifier}} bombs, damaging quicker over a larger area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_smoke_bomb: Increase n{@{.smoke_bomb}}'s range and area of effect.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shadow_travel: Increase your Walk Speed by f{+${values.1}%} when in n{@{.vanish}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_multihit_1: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.multihit}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.dagger_proficiency_: Increase your n{@{.assassin_main_attack}}'s range and add f{+${main_attack_damage_raw}} raw damage to all attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.last_laugh: When losing a b{Clone}, it will cast n{@{.spin_attack}} before dying.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_smoke_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.smoke_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.blazing_powder: n{@{.spin_attack}} will blind enemies and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.weightless: You gain f{+${values.1}} Mana if you hit an enemy while airborne.//8{(${values.2}+ blocks off the ground to be airborne)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.sandbagging: Reduce the cooldown on all of your abilities by f{${values.2}s} every time get hit for less than f{${values.1}%} of your max hp. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.hop: Leap forward when you double jump. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.dancing_blade: Deal damage to enemies you n{@{.dash}} through.
wynnlib.ability.desc.violent_vortex: Dealing over f{${values.1}x} of your max health as damage in a single hit will deal f{${values.2}%} of the damage to other nearby enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.delirious_gas: Increase your damage by f{+${ability_damage_bonus}%} while you're inside n{@{.smoke_bomb}} and gives you b{Lure} for f{${duration}s}.////While under b{Lure}, enemies will target only you and gain a speed buff.
wynnlib.ability.desc.marked: n{@{.smoke_bomb}} will add b{+${values.1} Mark} to enemies it hits. (Max ${max_marked}, ${cooldown}s Cooldown)////b{Marked} enemies will take f{+${marked_damage_bonus}%} damage from attacks for each mark they have.
wynnlib.ability.desc.echo: Your b{Clones} will mimic your spells and abilities, and you deal f{${ability_damage_bonus}%} of your normal damage while they are active.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shurikens: After using n{@{.dash}}, your next n{@{.assassin_main_attack}} will throw f{${hits}} shurikens.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_multihit: Increase n{@{.multihit}}'s amount of hits by f{+${hits}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.psithurism: Increase your Walk Speed by f{+${id_modifier.SPEED}%} and your Jump Height by f{+${id_modifier.JUMP_HEIGHT}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_dash_2: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.dash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.parry: After dodging damage, if you cast a spell within f{${values.1}s}, it will be free. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_spin_attack: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.spin_attack}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.death_magnet: Pull all nearby b{Marked} mobs towards you after leaving n{@{.vanish}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_multihit_2: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.multihit}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.hoodwink: When hitting enemies with n{@{.spin_attack}}, shorten the duration of your negative effects by f{${values.1}%} and transfer it onto enemies.////b{Lure} can be transfered to the feeble minded.//8{(Bosses and special enemies are immune)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.choke_bomb: n{@{.smoke_bomb}} will slow down enemies while in the smoke.
wynnlib.ability.desc.wall_jump: Reduce n{@{.hop}}'s cooldown by f{${-cooldown_modifier}s}. Using n{@{.hop}} into a wall will bounce you backward.//8{(Hold shift to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.fatal_spin: Increase n{@{.spin_attack}}'s area of effect and add b{${values.1} Mark} to enemies hit by n{@{.spin_attack}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_vortex: Increases n{@{.violent_vortex}}'s damage by f{+40%} and increases the damage requirement to be f{${values.1}x} of your max health.
wynnlib.ability.desc.harvester: After killing an enemy, gain f{+${values.1}} Mana for each leftover b{Marks} it had.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_smoke_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.smoke_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.blade_fury: While using n{@{.multihit}} on an enemy, lock their position in front of you.////n{@{.multihit}} gains extra damage and can be aimed in all directions.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_clone: Improve your damage by f{+${ability_damage_bonus}%} while your b{Clones} are active.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ricochets: Your n{@{.shurikens}} will bounce between enemies upon impact.
wynnlib.ability.desc.satsujin: If an enemy has b{${values.1} Marks} and f{${values.2}%} of their health or more, your next n{@{.multihit}} or n{@{.assassin_main_attack}} will deal f{+${satsujin.damage_bonus}%} damage. (${cooldown}s Cooldown, per enemy)
wynnlib.ability.desc.jasmine_bloom: After spending f{${values.1}} Mana, an area underneath you blooms that damages enemies below it every f{${damage_interval}s}.////The duration is reset and the radius is increased after every bloom. (Max ${bloom_aoe.max_range} Blocks)
wynnlib.ability.desc.diversion: Grants every nearby player f{+${values.1}%} health as extra overflowing health every time a b{Lured} enemy is killed. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)//The bonus health decays over f{${values.2}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_ricochets: Add f{+${shurikens_bounce_modifier}} Max Bounce to n{@{.ricochets}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_marked: Increase n{@{.marked}}'s damage bonus by f{+${marked_damage_bonus}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_main_attack: Fires three beams, each dealing 33% of the n{@{.shaman_main_attack}}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.totem: Summon a Totem that damages enemies around it every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.relik_proficiency_1: f{Double} your n{@{.shaman_main_attack}}'s beam speed and increase your damage when using a relik.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_totem_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.totem}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.totemic_smash: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will deal damage where it lands.
wynnlib.ability.desc.distant_grasp: Reduce your n{@{.shaman_main_attack}}'s spread, and increase its beam speed by f{+${values.1}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.hand_of_the_shaman: Your n{@{.shaman_main_attack}} will emit f{+${shaman_beams_modifier}} extra beams.//8{(Increases your overall damage by ${main_attack_modifier.damage}%)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.uproot: Emits a rapid projectile that will explode and knock enemies away.//8{(Hold shift to pull instead)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_haul_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.haul}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.aura: Radiates an aura from your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} that damages enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_earth_master: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_thunder_mast: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_fire_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.natures_jolt: Hitting the ground after using n{@{.haul}} will deal damage around you.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_water_master: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shocking_aura: n{@{.aura}} will travel faster and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flaming_tongue: n{@{.uproot}} will not explode or knockback enemies, but will deal its damage f{${values.1}} times. All elemental conversions become c{✹} Fire.
wynnlib.ability.desc.overseer: Increase n{@{.uproot}}'s range and hitting your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} with n{@{.uproot}} will reset its duration.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rain_dance: While mid-air, your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will leave a streak of rain that damages enemies under it every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.puppet_master: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will summon b{${values.1} Puppet} every f{${values.2}s}. (Max ${max_puppet}) They throw knives at nearby enemies every f{${damage_interval}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mask_of_the_lunatic: When casting n{@{.uproot}}, instead wear the b{Mask of the Lunatic}.//8{(Shift + Uproot to remove it)}////While wearing this mask, n{@{.aura}} cost is decreased and you gain a damage bonus at the cost of reduced walk speed.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sacrificial_shrine: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will siphon f{${blood_transfer.rate}%} of your health every f{${blood_transfer.interval}s} and transfer it into a b{Blood Pool}.////n{@{.aura}} will use f{${sacrificial_shrine.cost}%} of your b{Blood Pool} to deal f{+${sacrificial_shrine.damage_boost}%} damage and heal all allies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_puppets_1: Increase your Max b{Puppet} by f{+${max_puppet_modifier}} and reduce their damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uproot_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.uproot}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rebound: Once n{@{.aura}} reaches its maximum range, it will bounce back and deal its effects a second time.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stagnation: Enemies hit by n{@{.natures_jolt}} will be slowed down.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_aura_1: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.aura}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_totem: Increase your n{@{.totem}}'s area of effect.
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_connection: If you are outside of your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}}'s range, n{@{.haul}} will teleport you to it.
wynnlib.ability.desc.exploding_puppets: When your b{Puppets} have f{${values.1}s} left, they will charge towards enemies at high speed and explode.
wynnlib.ability.desc.hymn_of_hate: When wearing the b{Mask of the Lunatic}, killing an enemy with n{@{.aura}} will cast a new n{@{.aura}} at its location, dealing f{${hymn_of_hate}%} of its damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_blood_pool_1: Increase your maximum b{Blood Pool} by f{+${blood_pool_modifier}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.bullwhip: Hitting enemies with n{@{.uproot}} will make your b{Summons} focus them and deal additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_puppets_2: Increase your Max b{Puppet} by f{+${max_puppet_modifier}} and reduce their damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mask_of_the_fanatic: When casting n{@{.uproot}}, instead wear the b{Mask of the Fanatic}.//8{(Shift + Uproot to remove it)}////While wearing this mask, the mana cost of n{@{.totem}} is decreased and you gain resistance at the cost of reduced damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.vengeful_spirit: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will give all players in its range a damage bonus.
wynnlib.ability.desc.masquerade: Switching between b{Masks} f{${values.1}} times will give you f{${values.2}} Mana.
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_totem: Increase your maximum n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} by f{+${max_totem_modifier}} and reduce n{@{.totem}} and n{@{.aura}}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_totem_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.totem}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.storm_dance: Enemies hit by n{@{.aura}} will be pulled towards your totem.
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_moon: For every f{${id_convertor.source.SOULPOINTS}%} Soul Point Regen you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}/3s} Lifesteal. (Max ${id_convertor.max}/3s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_haul_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.haul}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_aura_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.aura}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.seeking_totem: While wearing the b{Mask of the Fanatic}, your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will move towards the nearest enemy outside of its range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.twisted_tether: When hitting an enemy with your n{@{.shaman_main_attack}}, use f{${tether.cost}%} from your b{Blood Pool} and add b{Tether} to them.////b{Tethered} enemies will take damage for every f{${tether.health_lose}%} Health you lose. (Max ${tether.max_lose}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.depersonalization: n{@{.masquerade}} will trigger after f{${values.1}} less b{Mask} switch. Reduce mana bonus by f{${values.2}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.crimson_effigy: Hitting your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} with n{@{.uproot}} will summon an b{Effigy} that will attack enemies and push them towards your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mask_of_the_coward: When casting n{@{.uproot}}, instead wear the b{Mask of the Coward}.//8{(Shift + Uproot to remove it)}////While wearing this mask, the mana cost of n{@{.haul}} is reduced and you gain walk speed at the cost of reduced resistance.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shaman_fluid_healin: Increase n{@{.aura}}'s healing by f{+${fluid_heal}%} for every f{1%} b{❉} Water Damage Bonus you have from items.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_blood_pool_2: Increase your maximum b{Blood Pool} by f{+${blood_pool_modifier}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.regeneration: Every f{${regeneration.interval}s}, your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} will heal every player within its range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.chant_of_the_coward: When switching to the b{Mask of the Coward}, damage and knock nearby enemies away.
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_rite: When a player gets hit while standing in your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}}'s range, f{${values.1}%} of the damage taken is added to your b{Blood Pool}. (Max ${values.2}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_effigies: Increase your Max b{Effigy} by f{+${max_effigy_modifier}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.chant_of_the_fanati: When switching to the b{Mask of the Fanatic}, you and your allies are given a temporary resistance buff. (${cooldown}s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.triple_totem: Increase your maximum n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.shaman_totem}} by f{+${max_totem_modifier}} and reduce n{@{.totem}} and n{@{.aura}}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.invigorating_wave: n{@{.aura}} will temporarily increase your b{Summons}'s attack speed. Player hit will gain f{+${values.1}} mana.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mengdu: For every f{${id_convertor.source.THORNS}%} Thorns you have from items, gain f{+${id_convertor.rate}%} Water Damage. (Max ${id_convertor.max}%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.frog_dance: When wearing the b{Mask of the Coward}, n{@{.haul}} will bounce you off the ground f{${hits}} times at an increasing speed and will deal damage to nearby enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_blood_pool_3: Increase your maximum b{Blood Pool} by f{+${blood_pool_modifier}%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shepherd: When you or your b{Summons} kill an enemy, gain f{+${shepherd.inc}} Max b{Puppets} for ${duration}s. (Max +${shepherd.max})
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_sorrow: n{@{.uproot}} will use f{${values.1}%} of your b{Blood Pool} to cast a destructive beam that damages enemies every f{${damage_interval}s}. You cannot attack while in that state.////You and allies hit will receive f{+${values.2}%} health as overflowing health instead. Bonus health decays over f{${values.3}s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uproot_2: Reduce the mana cost of n{@{.uproot}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mask_of_the_awakene: After saving f{${values.1}} mana from your Masks' mana reductions, casting n{@{.uproot}} will equip the b{Mask of the Awakened} for f{${duration}s}, giving you the power of all b{Masks} at once.
